## Life Tip of the Week

### Register to Vote

If you want to vote in the upcoming NYC Election, it's
time to register to vote:

> [https://www.vote.nyc/page/register-vote](https://www.vote.nyc/page/register-vote)

Early voting begins October 25th: need to be registered by then

- Forms must be _received_ not just mailed
